target.name: Target
target.description: A list of room(s) to send the message to.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information of notification. Supports the following keys: images -- a list of image paths to attach to the message, format -- either text or html, and thread_id -- an optional parent message to thread this message under. Optional.

react.name: React
react.description: Sends a reaction to a message.

message_id.name: Message ID
message_id.description: The ID of the message to react to.

room.name: Room
room.description: The room to send the reaction to.
